54894.name: Abyssal Summoner
54894.text: Battlecry: Summon a Demon with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.

55036.name: Aeroponics
55036.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (2) less for each Treant you control.

55006.name: Ancharrr
55006.text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your deck.
55006.flavorText: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

54906.name: Arcane Breath
54906.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
54906.flavorText: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

55250.name: Awaken!
55250.text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal 1 damage to all minions.
55250.flavorText: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

55421.name: Bad Luck Albatross
55421.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
55421.flavorText: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

55643.name: Bandersmosh
55643.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
55643.flavorText: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

55399.name: Big Ol' Whelp
55399.flavorText: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

55161.name: Blazing Battlemage
55161.flavorText: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

55103.name: Bloodsail Flybooter
55103.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
55103.flavorText: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

56226.name: Blowtorch Saboteur
56226.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
56226.flavorText: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

55052.name: Breath of Dreams
55052.text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
55052.flavorText: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

54898.name: Breath of the Infinite
54898.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.

55056.name: Bronze Explorer
55056.flavorText: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

55424.name: Camouflaged Dirigible
55424.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your next turn.
55424.flavorText: "What does that cloud look like to you?" "Trouble."

55101.name: Candle Breath
55101.text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3) less while you're holding a Dragon.
55101.flavorText: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres! Come before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

54904.name: Chenvaala
54904.text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Elemental.
54904.flavorText: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

55454.name: Chromatic Egg
55454.text: Battlecry: Secretly Discover a Dragon to hatch into. Deathrattle: Hatch!
55454.flavorText: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

54876.name: Chronobreaker
54876.text: Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
54876.flavorText: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

55288.name: Clear the Way
55288.text: Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
55288.flavorText: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

55425.name: Cobalt Spellkin
55425.text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to your hand.
55425.flavorText: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

54922.name: Corrosive Breath
54922.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, it also hits the enemy hero.
54922.flavorText: It's a breath of fresh terror!

54885.name: Crazed Netherwing
54885.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.

55021.name: Cumulo-Maximus
55021.text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.

54891.name: Dark Skies
54891.text: Deal 1 damage to a random minion. Repeat for each card in your hand.
54891.flavorText: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

55007.name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
55007.flavorText: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

55428.name: Depth Charge
55428.text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL minions.

55210.name: Devoted Maniac
55210.flavorText: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

54874.name: Disciple of Galakrond
54874.flavorText: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

54926.name: Diving Gryphon
54926.text: Rush Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.

55420.name: Dragon Breeder
55420.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to your hand.
55420.flavorText: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

54967.name: Dragon's Pack
54967.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.
54967.flavorText: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

55303.name: Dragonbane
55303.text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
55303.flavorText: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

54888.name: Dragonblight Cultist
54888.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
54888.flavorText: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

55280.name: Dragoncaster
55280.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
55280.flavorText: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

55408.name: Dragonmaw Poacher
55408.text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.

55441.name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
55441.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (0).

55072.name: Dragonrider Talritha
55072.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
55072.flavorText: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

55446.name: Dread Raven
55446.text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you control.
55446.flavorText: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

55292.name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
55292.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
55292.flavorText: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

55001.name: EVIL Quartermaster
55001.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
55001.flavorText: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

55283.name: Elemental Allies
55283.text: Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
55283.flavorText: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

55035.name: Embiggen
55035.text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).

54887.name: Envoy of Lazul
54887.text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
54887.flavorText: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

55416.name: Evasive Chimaera
55416.flavorText: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

54935.name: Evasive Drakonid
54935.flavorText: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

55423.name: Evasive Feywing
55423.flavorText: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

55429.name: Evasive Wyrm
55429.flavorText: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

55426.name: Faceless Corruptor
55426.text: Rush. Battlecry: Transform one of your minions into a copy of this.
55426.flavorText: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

54871.name: Fate Weaver
54871.text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
54871.flavorText: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

55251.name: Fiendish Rites
55251.flavorText: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

55405.name: Fire Hawk
55405.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
55405.flavorText: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

55105.name: Flik Skyshiv
55105.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
55105.flavorText: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

55304.name: Frizz Kindleroost
55304.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by (2).
55304.flavorText: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

57419.name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
57419.flavorText: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

57427.name: Galakrond, the Tempest
57427.flavorText: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

57413.name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
57413.flavorText: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

57416.name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
57416.flavorText: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

57329.name: Galakrond, the Wretched
57329.flavorText: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

55404.name: Goboglide Tech
55404.text: Battlecry: If you control a Mech, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
55404.flavorText: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

55031.name: Goru the Mightree
55031.text: Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.

54873.name: Grave Rune
54873.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
54873.flavorText: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

55975.name: Grizzled Wizard
55975.text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
55975.flavorText: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

55406.name: Gyrocopter
55406.flavorText: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

55415.name: Hippogryph
55415.flavorText: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

55400.name: Hoard Pillager
55400.text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
55400.flavorText: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

55402.name: Hot Air Balloon
55402.text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
55402.flavorText: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

55432.name: Kobold Stickyfinger
55432.flavorText: He no take candle. He take sword.

55907.name: Kronx Dragonhoof
55907.text: Battlecry: Draw Galakrond. If you're already Galakrond, unleash a Devastation.
55907.flavorText: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

55281.name: Learn Draconic
55281.text: Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
55281.flavorText: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

55067.name: Lightforged Crusader
55067.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
55067.flavorText: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

55068.name: Lightforged Zealot
55068.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a 4/2 Truesilver Champion.
55068.flavorText: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

54971.name: Lightning Breath
54971.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, also damage its neighbors.
54971.flavorText: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

55418.name: Living Dragonbreath
55418.flavorText: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

56161.name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
56161.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
56161.flavorText: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

54909.name: Mana Giant
54909.text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this game that didn't start in your deck.
54909.flavorText: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

54917.name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
54917.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.

55935.name: Molten Breath
55935.text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
55935.flavorText: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

55438.name: Murozond the Infinite
55438.text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
55438.flavorText: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

55099.name: Necrium Apothecary
55099.text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
55099.flavorText: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

54892.name: Nether Breath
54892.text: Deal 2 damage. If you're holding a Dragon, deal 4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
54892.flavorText: "Whether the Nether is cold, whether the Nether is hot, we'll burn together, whatever the Nether, whether we like it or not."

55024.name: Nithogg
55024.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
55024.flavorText: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

54919.name: Nozdormu the Timeless
54919.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.

55401.name: Parachute Brigand
55401.text: After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your hand.

55291.name: Phase Stalker
55291.text: After you use your Hero Power, cast a Secret from your deck.
55291.flavorText: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

55097.name: Praise Galakrond!
55097.flavorText: "Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12. 'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!' Let us reflect on this wisdom."

55294.name: Primordial Explorer
55294.flavorText: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

54893.name: Rain of Fire
54893.flavorText: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

55003.name: Ramming Speed
55003.text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.

54924.name: Righteous Cause
54924.flavorText: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

55276.name: Rolling Fireball
55276.text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.
55276.flavorText: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

55342.name: Sanctuary
55342.text: Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
55342.flavorText: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

55069.name: Sand Breath
55069.text: Give a minion +1/+2. Give it Divine Shield if you're holding a Dragon.
55069.flavorText: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

56189.name: Sathrovarr
56189.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck, and battlefield.
56189.flavorText: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

55431.name: Scalerider
55431.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
55431.flavorText: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

55000.name: Scion of Ruin
55000.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2 copies of this.

55246.name: Seal Fate
55246.text: Deal 3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
55246.flavorText: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

55033.name: Secure the Deck
55033.text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
55033.flavorText: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

55166.name: Shield of Galakrond
55166.flavorText: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

55470.name: Shu'ma
55470.text: At the end of your turn, fill your board with 1/1 Tentacles.
55470.flavorText: How to tell your mother to go away.

55047.name: Sky Claw
55047.text: Your other Mechs have +1 Attack. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
55047.flavorText: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

55005.name: Sky Raider
55005.text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
55005.flavorText: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

55004.name: Skybarge
55004.text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
55004.flavorText: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

55422.name: Skyfin
55422.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
55422.flavorText: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" "Yes."

54956.name: Squallhunter
54956.flavorText: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful! And since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

54965.name: Storm's Wrath
54965.flavorText: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

54923.name: Stormhammer
54923.text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a Dragon.
54923.flavorText: It brings the storm before the calm.

55102.name: Stowaway
55102.text: Battlecry: If there are cards in your deck that didn't start there, draw 2 of them.
55102.flavorText: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

55262.name: Strength in Numbers
55262.text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions. Reward: Summon a minion from your deck.
55262.flavorText: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

54966.name: Surging Tempest
54966.text: Has +1 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.

55208.name: Tasty Flyfish
55208.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.

55466.name: Tentacled Menace
55466.text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their Costs.
55466.flavorText: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

55301.name: Toxic Reinforcements
55301.text: Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
55301.flavorText: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

55436.name: Transmogrifier
55436.text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
55436.flavorText: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

55039.name: Treenforcements
55039.text: Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.

55417.name: Troll Batrider
55417.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
55417.flavorText: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

54960.name: Twin Tyrant
54960.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
54960.flavorText: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

55094.name: Umbral Skulker
55094.text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, add 3 Coins to your hand.
55094.flavorText: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

55427.name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
55427.text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
55427.flavorText: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

54896.name: Valdris Felgorge
54896.text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
54896.flavorText: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

54890.name: Veiled Worshipper
54890.flavorText: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

55640.name: Veranus
55640.text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
55640.flavorText: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

54907.name: Violet Spellwing
54907.text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
54907.flavorText: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

55104.name: Waxadred
55104.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
55104.flavorText: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

54872.name: Whispers of EVIL
54872.flavorText: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

55403.name: Wing Commander
55403.text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.

55407.name: Wyrmrest Purifier
55407.text: Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.

55030.name: Ysera, Unleashed
55030.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.

55414.name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
55414.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
55414.flavorText: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

54897.name: Zzeraku the Warped
54897.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, summon a 6/6 Nether Drake.
